name: flipside-player
description: A browser-based Spotify player with a split-vinyl UI

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.dev:build: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend
